project_descr: Support to National Budget Transparency in the Kyrgyz Republic

outputs.output_descr: The objective of the UNDP project on Support to National Budget Transparency is to assist the country in development of an anticorruption framework with specific focus on reduction of corruption in the budgetary area through transparency and improved budgetary oversight and audits. Specifically it is expected that the Project will contribute to (1) improving anticorruption strategies and implementation plans and will support efforts of state agencies and civil society organizations in establishing an operational anticorruption framework and social coalition; (2) improving budget expertise and
donor_name: UNITED STATES AGENCY FOR INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT (USAID)
